name: cf_ai_study-buddy
description: AI-powered adaptive learning assistant on Cloudflare

scripts.install:all: cd worker && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd worker && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:worker && npm run deploy:frontend

author: Saad Amin <saad05@vt.edu>
